Title: Relates to siting permits for grassland bird breeding habitats or grassland bird wintering habitats
Summary: Requires a mitigation ratio of one acre for every acre of occupied grassland bird breeding habitat and one acre of mitigation for every acre of grassland bird wintering habitat included in a major electric transmission facility siting permit.
LawCode: Amd ยง139, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to siting permits for grassland bird breeding habitats or grassland bird wintering habitats
